Form elements are interactive elements which allow additional interaction possibilities in the Composer or the final PDF document. For more detailed explanation, please see form fields editability chapter. The following form elements are currently supported in the Composer:

- Text field (single line)

Allows input of a single line of text

![](data:image/png;base64,)

*Text field*

- Text area (multi line)

Allows the input of multiple lines of text

![](data:image/png;base64,)

*Text area*

- Combobox

Allows user to pick option form the dropdown list

![](data:image/png;base64,)

*Combo box*

- Listbox

Allows user to pick option form the displayed list

![](data:image/png;base64,)

*List box*

- Checkbox

Allows setting or clearing of a check mark, for answering Yes/No questions.

![](data:image/png;base64,)

*Checkbox*

- Radio button

Allows user to pick one of many options

![](data:image/png;base64,)

*Radio button*

- Button

Allows to trigger configured logic

![](data:image/png;base64,)

*Button*
